entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is being strangled by the silver hand. He was reaping his reward for his hesitation and moment of pity.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail's throat is being crushed by the metal fingers, he is turning blue and eventually dies.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry tries to pull the metal fingers from around Wormtail's throat with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron tries to pull the metal fingers from around Wormtail's throat with Harry and attempts to cast a spell on Pettigrew.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione gives a dreadful scream from overhead, but no description of her action is given in the provided text.

relationships.description: Pettigrew is being strangled by the silver hand, which Harry and Ron are trying to remove.
Wormtail's death is caused by Pettigrew being strangled, but it seems that Wormtail was already dying when he was killed.
Harry tries to pull the metal fingers from around Wormtail's throat with Ron.
Ron attempts to cast a spell on Pettigrew, but it does not work.
